property.name: numberOfPages
property.label: Number of Pages
property.description: Number of total pages for the progress bar to keep track of

property.name: currentPage
property.label: Current Page
property.description: The current page this progress bar is living on

property.name: completedPages
property.label: Completed Pages
property.description: A comma-separated string containing the pages that have been completed. It's recommended to assign this to a variable that you update as users finish screens

property.name: pageNavigation
property.label: Page to Navigate To
property.description: Holds the value of the page the user wishes to navigate to through the progress bar
